title: An afternote about the second meme war.
body:
[](http://rs25.pbsrc.com/albums/c90/sc4087/Notthisagain.jpg~c200)
A lot of people seem to think that Aqua, Hades, and Airman are to blame for this war. While they certainly became part of it and played a good game of it, and seemingly unintentionally causing the exodus of fish. 
(I have found no good sources on this, if you have some I would appreciate seeing it.)

Not one of them was the cause of it.
The first post stating that this was in fact going to be a meme war was this one.
http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/memes/Zv4TuNua-there-seems-to-be-another-war-on-the-horizon
And I will hold responsibility for all of the actions of the participants.

replies.body: FUCK WHOEVER IS DOWNVOTING THIS, MY GOD, I AM SO DONE, CAN SOMEONE OTHER THAN ME UPVOTE THIS TO RESTORE BALANCE!?
Honesty tho, the sooner the people drop this whole thing the quicker the recovery can begin. This is Memes and Games. I just hate seeing all this drama.
http://i.imgur.com/f7FdEdG.jpg?noredirect
It seems people are just straight downvoting you now... people irritate me sometimes...

I mean you can't really blame them for being pissed off.

Just relax and let the fire burn out

I'm sorry, I just gotta say this to an online living person. 

I really love that bot, its so cute that it keeps randomly downvotign me. I just wish it downvoted my posts with a 100 downvotes, then I can use my secret gif.
This used to be a board where downvote drones didn't exist. So many posts had like 40 upvotes and zero downvotes, it was glorious.

It are people who hate me, like le lennygan or something like that. He is stalking me, Glory, and Airman, because we did our best to create the Airman Compsci Company (ACC). lel, nah its called Queen's Army, but I like ACC better.

I can assure you, Im not the one down voting.

Well, I guess you can see why I'm a possibility, but if you look at the replies that involve me previously flaming the whole idea, get up voted 2-3 times.
yeah, I only read the thread about the bot after I had written it. Sorry man.
Doesn't matter who is doing it, I'll counter it with an upvote when I can.

Y'know, there's a roleplay board if you guys are into that sorta thing. I actually write a lot so I can respect it, but waving it around M&G seems a bit odd. It doesn't really belong here. I'd honestly prefer it if the downvoting and the roleplaying went away (if you guys would like to invite people to join your group totally make a thread about it!) 

I've noticed the Shaco guy and Airman have lots of downvotes. Which is whatever. But they have downvotes on every post, even on the good ones that have nothing to do with any of that meme war army whatever. It's so immature and childish and it really needs to stop
Yeah, I know the Roleplaying boards, but I haven't seen any interesting threads that would have me.

Well, the roleplay thing was something that just came up because most of us have these boards characters. Aqua is shaco, darken is reksai, I'm the Queen (cringe),  Hades is - well - Hades, Face the Sun is Leona, MM is Morde, etc. It originally was kind of a small thing but then people got into it since it was pretty simple and others enjoyed treating others in character, and being treated through their character. Doing the RP stuff on discord is going to be something that not everyone has to do, but everyone will have the option to do. Other than that, the only "RP Requirement" is just referring to each other as our characters.
There is no real evidence to support this, fish isn't dead, he is taking a break, like raptor did.

aka, his leave.

gods don't die, :)

I sparked the flame, I am to blame.
Just focus on the cookies. The longer we dwell on this, the harder it will be to heal.
truth right there.

**Enough**

Look, the people will blame who they wish to, and will act accordingly

Let us leave it at that and put the rest of this thing to bed

AND, if people want to beat the shit out of me for this whole incident, The Roast is Open... 

**BE MY GUEST**

The Crab is innocent, Hades... he's fine, Airman is the least guilty despite everything that happened.

I know people will be bitter to us, and may hold us at a lower stature now... and I will happily accept that, just leave my friends out of it... They're fine

In time it will be forgotten and maybe forgiven, but until then if may be tough. 

Though in looking at it, the only people who haven't forgiven are those who don't bother posting and only vote. So who cares about them?
Honestly it was the followers of each side that really were to blame. they took it into unrelated threads where people really didnt give a shit.
